summary: Water quality is stable but approaching upper limits for tilapia. Monitor closely.

insights.recommendation: Maintain pH between 6.5 and 7.5. Consider adding pH buffers if it rises further.
Monitor TDS levels; aim to keep below 500 ppm for optimal fish health.
Ensure water temperature remains below 30°C to prevent stress on tilapia.

extended_notes:
Last 7 days overview:
• pH avg/min/max: 7.037 / 7.014 / 7.106 (trend: up)
• TDS avg/min/max: 327.907 / 307.8 / 332.5 ppm (trend: up)
• Temp avg/min/max: 25.558 / 23.56 / 29.62 °C (trend: up)

Actions (if needed):
• pH: keep ~6.6–7.2; calibrate probe with 7.00/4.01; adjust slowly.
• TDS: seedlings ~200–500 ppm; higher OK for mature plants; water-change to reduce.
• Temp: hold in target band for your fish/plants; heater/chiller/aeration as needed.
